briefdescription.para: Symbol indicating whether the configuration of analog input using pin number is present.

LPCOMP task.

briefdescription.para: Function for retrieving the state of the LPCOMP event.

The event has not been generated.

LPCOMP event to be cleared.

LPCOMP event.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting LPCOMP shorts.

Mask of shortcuts.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing LPCOMP shorts by mask.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of shortcuts.

briefdescription.para: Function for for setting the specified shortcuts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of shortcuts.

briefdescription.para: Function for enabling interrupts from LPCOMP.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be enabled. Use nrf_lpcomp_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

briefdescription.para: Function for disabling interrupts from LPCOMP.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be disabled. Use nrf_lpcomp_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking if the specified interrupts are enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be checked. Use nrf_lpcomp_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting subscribe configuration for a given LPCOMP task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which the configuration is set.
Channel through which events are subscribed.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing subscribe configuration for a given LPCOMP task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which the configuration is cleared.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting publish configuration for a given LPCOMP event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which the configuration is set.
Channel through which the event is published.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing publish configuration for a given LPCOMP event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which the configuration is cleared.

briefdescription.para: Function for configuring LPCOMP.

detaileddescription.para: This function powers on LPCOMP and configures it. LPCOMP is in DISABLE state after configuration, so it must be enabled before using it. All shorts are inactive, events are cleared, and LPCOMP is stopped.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the reference source.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
LPCOMP reference selection.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the external analog reference source.

detaileddescription.para: To use external reference first call nrf_lpcomp_ref_set with NRF_LPCOMP_REF_EXT_REF argument.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
LPCOMP external analog reference selection.

briefdescription.para: Function for selecting an active LPCOMP input.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Input to be selected.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the detection type.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
LPCOMP detection type.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the hysteresis.

LPCOMP comparator hysteresis.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking if the LPCOMP peripheral is enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
The LPCOMP peripheral is enabled.
The LPCOMP peripheral is not enabled.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the last LPCOMP compare result.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The last compare result. If 0, then VIN+ < VIN-. If 1, then VIN- < VIN+.
